alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 06 at 3:55AM HST until December 06 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES IS CANCELLED... .A large north-northwest swell will decrease through the day. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Large surf of 12 to 16 feet expected along north facing shores today. * WHERE...North facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai and Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Windward Haleakala
